Confidential Trust-Gated
Payroll

Pay your team with encrypted tokens. Trust scores gate payment flows. Nobody sees salaries except those who should.

Employer DashboardEmployee Portal

Encrypted Salaries

ERC-7984 confidential tokens keep all salary amounts private. Only authorized parties can decrypt their own data.

Trust-Gated Payments

EigenTrust reputation scores determine payment flow. High trust gets instant pay, medium gets delayed, low enters escrow.

Employee Self-Service

Workers decrypt only their own salary and payment data. Full privacy with self-sovereign access control.

How It Works

1

Register Employees

Employer adds employees with encrypted salaries. No one on-chain can see the amounts.

2

Assign Trust Scores

Oracles submit encrypted trust scores. The tier classification happens entirely within FHE.

3

Execute Payroll

Payroll routes payments through trust tiers. High trust gets instant pay, others enter time-locks or escrow.

Built with Zama FHEVM | ERC-7984 Confidential Tokens
